seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

image.title: Image
image.description: Image for use as the initial frame of the video.

fast_mode.description: Speed up generation with different levels of acceleration. Faster modes may degrade quality somewhat. The speedup is dependent on the content, so different videos may see different speedups.

lora_scale.title: Lora Scale
lora_scale.description: Determines how strongly the main LoRA should be applied. Sane results between 0 and 1 for base inference. You may still need to experiment to find the best value for your particular lora.

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the output video.

lora_weights.title: Lora Weights
lora_weights.description: Load LoRA weights. Supports HuggingFace URLs in the format huggingface.co/<owner>/<model-name>, CivitAI URLs in the format civitai.com/models/<id>[/<model-name>], or arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet.

sample_shift.title: Sample Shift
sample_shift.description: Flow shift parameter for video generation

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements

disable_safety_checker.title: Disable Safety Checker
disable_safety_checker.description: Disable safety checker for generated videos

duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements

enable_prompt_expansion.title: Enable Prompt Expansion
enable_prompt_expansion.description: If set to true, the prompt optimizer will be enabled

duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to avoid certain elements

enable_prompt_expansion.title: Enable Prompt Expansion
enable_prompt_expansion.description: If set to true, the prompt optimizer will be enabled

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Omit for random generations

image.title: Image
image.description: Input image to start generating from. Ideal images are 16:9 or 9:16 and 1280x720 or 720x1280, depending on the aspect ratio you choose.

last_frame.title: Last Frame
last_frame.description: Ending image for interpolation. When provided with an input image, creates a transition between the two images.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Description of what to exclude from the generated video

duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the video. Ignored if start_image is provided.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Things you do not want to see in the video

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Leave blank for random

num_frames.title: Num Frames
num_frames.description: Number of video frames. 81 frames give the best results

resolution.description: Resolution of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of video. 16:9 corresponds to 832x480px, and 9:16 is 480x832px

optimize_prompt.title: Optimize Prompt
optimize_prompt.description: Translate prompt to Chinese before generation

frames_per_second.title: Frames Per Second
frames_per_second.description: Frames per second. Note that the pricing of this model is based on the video duration at 16 fps

interpolate_output.title: Interpolate Output
interpolate_output.description: Interpolate the generated video to 30 FPS using ffmpeg

disable_safety_checker.title: Disable Safety Checker
disable_safety_checker.description: Disable safety checker for generated video.

lora_scale_transformer.title: Lora Scale Transformer
lora_scale_transformer.description: Determines how strongly the transformer LoRA should be applied.

lora_scale_transformer_2.title: Lora Scale Transformer 2
lora_scale_transformer_2.description: Determines how strongly the transformer_2 LoRA should be applied.

lora_weights_transformer.title: Lora Weights Transformer
lora_weights_transformer.description: Load LoRA weights for transformer. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet (for example, 'https://huggingface.co/Viktor1717/scandinavian-interior-style1/resolve/main/my_first_flux_lora_v1.safetensors')

lora_weights_transformer_2.title: Lora Weights Transformer 2
lora_weights_transformer_2.description: Load LoRA weights for transformer_2. Supports arbitrary .safetensors URLs from the Internet. Can be different from transformer LoRA.
